ClassRoomsLA0.Location: The classroom is located the glass room that is near the stairs
Head through the hallway behind the service desk into the open area. The classromm is located on the left side

Head through the hallway behind the service desk into the open area, exit this area through the door on the left side of the room. Walk past the workshop to the stairs. The room is located at the top of the stairs behind the double doors.

FloorsLA.Location: Take the stairs that are located in the hallway past the service desk.
